title: XBRL UTR plane Angle Item Type units (2024-10-22)
description: Valid units for planeAngleItemType as defined in the XBRL Units Type Registry

anyOf.title: Degree
anyOf.description: The degree is a measurement of a plane angle, defined so that a full rotation is 360 degrees. In XBRL the degree is reported in a decimal format

anyOf.title: Radian
anyOf.description: The radian is the standard unit of angular measure. The radian is an SI derived unit
